?det_threshold: the conf lower than this will be discarded, ranging from 0.0 to 1.0, the higher the more strict
?compute_every_frames: compute the detection every N frames, indicates that N-1 frames will be skipped
?sync_results_frame: if true, the frame won't be updated until the corresponding result computed, latency might be observed; if false, the results computed from previous frames will be inherit to this frame, misalignments might be observed for fast movements
